001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.BackpressureStrategy;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
007import org.slf4j.Logger;
008import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
009
010/**
011 * Interface with {@link PollingChainTipService#pollForDistinctChainTip()} method.
012 */
013public interface PollingChainTipService extends RxJsonChainTipClient {
014    Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PollingChainTipService.class);
015
016    /**
017     * Implement this method to provide a polling interval
018     *
019     * @return polling interval with desired frequency for polling for new ChainTips.
020     */
021    Observable<Long> getPollingInterval();
022
023    /**
024     * Using a polling interval provided by {@link PollingChainTipService#getPollingInterval()} provide a
025     * stream of distinct {@link ChainTip}s.
026     *
027     * @return A stream of distinct {@code ChainTip}s.
028     */
029    default Flowable<ChainTip> pollForDistinctChainTip() {
030        return getPollingInterval()
031                .doOnNext(t -> log.debug("got interval"))
032                .flatMapMaybe(t -> this.currentChainTipMaybe())
033                .doOnNext(tip -> log.debug("blockheight, blockhash = {}, {}", tip.getHeight(), tip.getHash()))
034                .distinctUntilChanged(ChainTip::getHash)
035                .doOnNext(tip -> log.info("** NEW ** blockheight, blockhash = {}, {}", tip.getHeight(), tip.getHash()))
036                // ERROR backpressure strategy is compatible with BehaviorProcessor since it subscribes to MAX items
037                .toFlowable(BackpressureStrategy.ERROR);
038    }
039}
